name: Student Taught Courses(StuCo):Qatari Dialect for Non-native Speakers
base_name: Student Taught Courses(StuCo):Qatari Dialect for Non-native Speakers
long_desc: Even though most nationals speak English fluently, speaking Arabic in a Qatari dialect is an essential tool for socializing with nationals in Qatar. This course would introduce you to the Arabic language, the Arabic phonics and mainly speaking accurately and confidently in Arabic. We will explore topics such as Greetings, introductions, Travel, Leisure and Food. Homework will be assigned before and after each class meeting. Midterm will be written and final will be oral.
